scripts.install-all: cd AllInteractions && npm install && cd ../DaoPools && npm install && cd ../DaoValidators && npm install
scripts.codegen-all: cd AllInteractions && npm run codegen && cd ../DaoPools && npm run codegen && cd ../DaoValidators && npm run codegen
scripts.test-all: cd AllInteractions && npm run test  && cd ../DaoPools && npm run test && cd ../DaoValidators && npm run test
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-ts-fix && npm run lint-ql-fix && npm run lint-json-fix && npm run lint-yaml-fix
